name: Last Walk Home
description:
Last Walk Home is a group student project created as a spiritual successor of a game for the purposes of completing a Games Design course. The game begins as you get off the train and have 4 minutes to get home before it gets too dark. Player must trade items between NPCs and scene objects in order to complete tasks preventing him from getting home.

the game was never 100% finished as we ran out of time within the 13 week module length.
